item.title: Fisk's 'Mississippi River Meander' in R
item.description: Background Prep Data cleaning Explore geological ages and formations Wisconsin glaciation Context and inset map Finishing up Notes Data citation Background Those of us even mildly obsessed with maps will be familiar with Harold Fisk’s 1944 series documenting the historic travel of the Mississippi River in Mississippi River Alluvial Valley. In my house in college, filled with geography majors and map enthusiasts, we had a small print hung on the wall, and it was easy to start reading it, and end up standing there, just staring, for quite a while.

item.title: Visualizing mental health data with ggplot2
item.description: Export and download app data Clean and tidy Visualize moods over time with ggplot2 Custom styles October 2019 update now with gganimate! Inspiration and credits Things I love include data visualization, tutorials, and fighting mental illness stigma. This post combines them all! I made a pretty neat layout with plots and a map of my Location History a while back, and here I’ll walk through some of the data cleaning process and custom styling.
